alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Tammany Parish in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Hancock Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 448 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stennis Space Center, or 11 miles west of Diamondhead, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Slidell, Pearlington and Stennis Space Center. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 267 and 273. Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 12 between mile markers 83 and 84. Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany
